text: Blac Chyna will be seeking a restraining order against Rob Kardashian after his social media'revenge porn'tirade and details of an account of his'violence'have emerged. The 29 - year - old model's lawyer Lisa Bloom took to her Twitter on Friday to reveal they will be taking legal action. The 55 - year - old American civil rights attorney wrote :'I represent Blac Chyna. I just gave Rob Kardashian notice that we'll be in court Monday seeking restraining orders against him. More to come.'Later on in the day, Chyna was seen for the first time since the announcement while out with her and Kardashian's seven - month - old daughter Dream in Los Angeles.
